mapper.insert: INSERT INTO receipt (user_no, express, address, total_price, payment_date, payment) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{express}, #{address}, #{totalPrice}, #{paymentDate}, #{payment})
INSERT INTO item (amount, each_price, taste, options_no, receipt_no) VALUES (#{amount}, #{eachPrice}, #{taste}, #{optionsNo}, #{receiptNo})
mapper.select:
SELECT r.express as express, r.payment_date as paymentDate, g.name as goodsName, o.taste as taste, r.user_no as userNo, r.no as receiptNo
FROM item i JOIN receipt r ON i.receipt_no = r.no JOIN options o ON i.options_no = o.no JOIN goods g ON o.goods_no = g.no WHERE r.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY r.no DESC
SELECT i.*, g.name as goodsName, o.taste, i.each_price as eachPrice FROM item i JOIN options o ON i.options_no = o.no JOIN goods g ON o.goods_no = g.no WHERE i.receipt_no = #{receiptNo}

SELECT r.no as receiptNo, r.user_no as userNo, r.address as address, r.total_price as totalPrice, r.payment_date as paymentDate, r.payment as payment, u.name as userName, u.hp as userHp FROM receipt r join user u on r.user_no = u.no WHERE r.no = 15
